name: Find the Dog
description:
I lost my dog. Help me find him.

Controls:
WASD - Move
Shift - Run

Made by 

  • Ahmet Nergiz - Art
  • Mustafa Güneş Yaya - Programming
  • Ozan Harc - Music

Thanks to Melek Ege Özen for 2D contributions.

Used free Backyard sprite pack made by Kittens and Elves Work.
